fields.name: Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> Ayato's Elemental Skill gains the following properties: After it is used, Ayato will gain 2 Namisen stacks; and when the water illusion explodes, Ayato will gain a Namisen effect equal to the maximum number of stacks possible.

fields.name: Michiyuku Hagetsu
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> If Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he will regenerate 2 Energy for himself every second.

fields.name: Daily Cooking
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, he has an 18% chance to receive an additional ‘Suspicious’ dish of the same type.
